attributes.action: We want CPR & First aid as part of national curriculum.
attributes.background: Currently most CPR and First Aid course come at a price but in reality as a child growing or teenager most incidents happen when you are with friends. If we can teach the basic of life saving first aid and cpr many lives may not end so soon.

rejection.details:
We think that this petition is similar:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/217801
